title: The triumph of faith The sacrifice of Isaac. The ship-wracke of Ionas. With a song of the victorie obtained by the French king, at Yvry. Written in French, by W. Salustius lord of Bartas, and translated by Iosuah Siluester, marchant aduenturer.
author: Du Bartas, Guillaume de Salluste, seigneur, 1544-1590.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Richard Yardley, and Peter Short, and are to be sold at the Starre on Bredstreet hill,
